text:
@bbcquestiontime @BernardineEvari An apology is due to Bernardine from Fiona Bruce. Bernadine said about @BorisJohnson bragging about shaking hands with Coronavirus patients and Bruce cut her off saying he shook hands with staff. Disgraceful,again from Bruce ever willing to stick up for J.
https://t.co/4YEookGA72
